name: Vegetable Fried Rice
history: Fried rice is a dish commonly found in many Asian cultures. The basic recipe involves stir-frying cooked rice with a variety of ingredients, including vegetables, eggs, and meats. Vegetable fried rice is a popular vegetarian variant.
description: Vegetable Fried Rice is a savory, quick, and easy dish made with cooked rice stir-fried with a mix of vegetables like carrots, bell peppers, and peas. Seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and sometimes ginger, it's a versatile dish that can be customized with additional ingredients.

equipment.name: wok or large frying pan
equipment.description: For stir-frying the rice and vegetables.

instructions.title: Heat the Oil
instructions.description: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat.

instructions.title: SautÃ© Vegetables
instructions.description: Add the garlic and sautÃ© for a minute. Then add the carrots, bell pepper, and peas, cooking until they are just tender.

instructions.title: Add Rice and Soy Sauce
instructions.description: Add the cooked rice to the wok. Stir-fry for a few minutes, then pour in the soy sauce. Mix well to ensure the rice is evenly coated.

instructions.title: Season and Serve
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper. Add the green onions and stir-fry for another minute. Serve the vegetable fried rice hot.

tips: Use rice that has been cooked and chilled for the best texture.
Keep the stir-frying process quick and use high heat to achieve the classic fried rice texture.
variations: Add scrambled eggs or tofu for protein.
Experiment with other vegetables like broccoli, corn, or snap peas.

storage.shelfLife: Can be refrigerated for up to 2 days.
storage.instructions: Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

reheatingInstructions: Reheat in a microwave or on a stovetop with a little added water or oil.
presentationTips: Serve in a bowl, garnished with additional chopped green onions or sesame seeds.
Pair with a side of hot sauce or a simple salad.
